com.sharethrough.sdk

Interface IAdView

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BasicAdView

    public interface IAdView
    Interface that defines methods used to construct a Sharethrough ad unit.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void adReady()
      This method is called when the ad is ready to be displayed.
      TextView getAdvertiser() 
      ViewGroup getAdView() 
      ImageView getBrandLogo() 
      TextView getDescription() 
      ImageView getOptout() 
      FrameLayout getThumbnail() 
      TextView getTitle() 

    • Method Detail

      • adReady

        void adReady()
        This method is called when the ad is ready to be displayed.

      • getTitle

        TextView getTitle()
        Returns:
        The TextView into which the title text should be rendered. May not be null.

      • getDescription

        TextView getDescription()
        Returns:
        The View into which the description text should be rendered. May be null.

      • getAdvertiser

        TextView getAdvertiser()
        Returns:
        The TextView into which the advertiser/sponsor text should be rendered. May not be null.

      • getThumbnail

        FrameLayout getThumbnail()
        Returns:
        The FrameLayout into which the image should be rendered. May not be null.

      • getBrandLogo

        ImageView getBrandLogo()
        Returns:
        The ImageView into which the brand logo should be rendered. May be null.

      • getOptout

        ImageView getOptout()
        Returns:
        The ImageView into which the optout icon should be rendered. May not be null.

      • getAdView

        ViewGroup getAdView()
        Returns:
        The View containing the contents of the ad. Normally your IAdView implementation will be a subclass of ViewGroup and you should return this.
